# init(_:userInfo:)

**Initializer**

Creates a payment error object of the specified type with the specified user information.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ code: Code, userInfo: [String : Any] = [:])
```

## Parameters

- **code**: The error code for the type of payment error.
- **userInfo**: The additional details for the error.
title: init(_:userInfo:)
